about_the_game:
Here is a video present from the girls, a little something to remember them by! You earned it. Your victories were worth it.

This Animations Pack contains all the animations featured in the game in .mp4 and .gif format. Just go into the game's installation location, find the Animations Pack folder, and enjoy!

AniCore Team is deeply grateful for your support 💋

content_descriptors.notes: All characters in the game are adults. The full game and this animations pack contain adult content: nudity and sexual scenes with various fetishes that some viewers may find offensive: masturbation, titjob, blowjob, vaginal, anal and non-penetrative sexual acts. The full game contains swearing and use of alcohol.
